mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_admin_room(a_acc_no, a_r_name, a_r_state, a_r_price, a_r_check_in, a_r_check_out, a_r_count, a_r_content, a_r_reg_date, a_r_mod_date, a_m_no) SELECT #{a_acc_no}, #{a_r_name}, #{a_r_state}, #{a_r_price}, #{a_r_check_in}, #{a_r_check_out}, #{a_r_count}, #{a_r_content}, NOW(), NOW(), a_m_no FROM tbl_admin_accommodation WHERE a_acc_no = #{a_acc_no}
mapper.select: SELECT a_r_no FROM tbl_admin_room WHERE a_m_no = #{a_m_no} and a_acc_no = #{a_acc_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_room_image (a_r_no, r_i_image, r_i_reg_date) values (#{a_r_no}, #{r_i_image}, NOW())
mapper.select: select a_r_no, a_acc_no, a_m_no, a_r_name, a_r_state, a_r_price, a_r_check_in, a_r_check_out, a_r_count, a_r_content, a_r_reg_date, a_r_mod_date from tbl_admin_room where a_m_no = #{a_m_no} and a_acc_no = #{a_acc_no} and use_yn = 'Y'
select r_i_no, r_i_image from tbl_room_image where a_r_no = #{a_r_no}
